document.full_text: the walt disney co. has scuttled a planned remake of the beatles' "yellow submarine" being developed by the producer of its costly bomb "mars needs moms," sources tell the hollywood reporter.
document.title: disney torpedoes zemeckis' "yellow submarine"
lines_and_colors: the walt disney co. has scuttled a planned remake of the beatles' "yellow submarine" being developed by the producer of its costly bomb "mars needs moms," sources tell the hollywood reporter.
